prompts: Design a cute, tiny Pokemon that resembles a rock with green leaves on top.
Create a playful Pokemon that looks like a small tree stump with a happy face.
Generate an adorable creature inspired by nature, featuring earthy tones and cartoonish features.
Imagine a whimsical Pokemon that could blend into forests, with a round body and leafy appendages.
Show me a Pokemon that embodies the spirit of nature, with a friendly expression and earthy colors.
Make a tiny Pokemon that has a body resembling a rock and is topped with bright green leaves.
Give me a Pokemon that looks like a small, round creature with a joyful demeanor and plant-like features.
